channel.title: How do these servers get so many players?
channel.description: How do servers like project catastrophe and crisisx get SOOO many players on them??

item.title: How do these servers get so many players?
item.dc:creator: @travisabbott travisabbott
item.description:
@travisabbott wrote:

good advertising, ppl who want to paly a private server will just go straight to a top listâ€¦

and if they have paid to get to a top list obviously ppl always click the first one and play it

Read full topic
item.source: How do these servers get so many players?

item.title: How do these servers get so many players?
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

  1. 100% Uptime
  2. Dedicated VPS/Server
  3. Advertising
  4. Good Server
  5. Willing to spend money
  6. Being up for awhile (Like a year or so)

Read full topic
item.source: How do these servers get so many players?
